meta_description: Learn more about Climate Tech Connect, our mission, our team, and how we are driving innovation in climate technology. Join us in making a difference.

hero.title: Establishing Benelux as the Europe's climate tech leader
hero.description:
Our collective efforts in the next decades will determine the fate of a large portion of the planet — it's about time we shift our role from nature takers to nature stewards.

Our environment shapes us probably more thank we think. That's why we created CTC — we believe the real-world, transformative movement can be created through high quality social ties & relationships. Everyday we are immersed in different networks, that can have both negative and positive impact on us.

In a sustainability context, community is not only for solving the basic human need of connection — it's about education, storytelling, contributing to the solutions of different systemic issues.

block1.title: Who we are
block1.description: We believe the real world value can be created through high quality social ties & relationships.

block2.title: Why we do it
block2.description:
Using our network and strategic support, we want to propel growth of the most innovative climate tech Benelux companies, help them secure consistent, sustainable capital, access community & knowledge.

We see sustainability as a call to action & want to make it easier for those who actively strive towards building a more regenerative lifestyle, a better world.

Science shows that community and a sense of belonging can boost our cognitive functions & emotional intelligence, and shape us into more empathetic beings; we can use this human programming to collectively expand our knowledge and awaraness, and ultimately - drive real world change.
